Key Match Events: Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal for Croatia in the 76th minute
Klaus Gjasula scored a last-gasp equalizer for Albania in the 95th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Croatia's Luka Modric and his teammates looked disappointed after the match
Albania coach Sylvinho said he was proud of his team's performance
Klaus Gjasula said he was happy with the result and described it as a 'beautiful, historic day'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Volksparkstadion in Hamburg was split evenly between red-clad Albania fans and spectators in Croatia's checkered shirt
Fans in Croatia's section set off flares repeatedly, despite warnings over the loudspeakers
